attributes.action: stop bbc advertising or revoke the licence money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: stop the BBC advertising their other channel's programmes, on a current  channel.they may be advertising their own programmes but it is still advertising. i thought that they receive licence money because they are not allowed to advertise. if this is not so then they should not get the licence money it should be free like other countries.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
